# Board of Directors & Officers

## Interim Governance

Until TIOTF reaches ten (10) paying members, governance may be
performed by an Interim Governing Committee appointed by the
Incorporators.

## Board Composition

Once seated, the Board shall consist of 8â€“16 Directors:

- 33% Tire Manufacturers
- 33% Service Provider
- 33% Other Industries

No organization may hold more than one seat unless allowed by bylaws.

## Officers

- Executive Director
- Treasurer
- Secretary
- Chief Security Officer (or equivalent)

Officers are appointed by and accountable to the Board.
